title: Properties of the net force on the block at C

content.prompt: Which of the following is true of the net force on the block when it is at position C ?

choices.label: It is directed to the left only.
It is directed to the right only.
It has components both to the left and vertically downward.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
